name: A Real Lovecraftian Horror
description:
This game was developed for the  Shitty Horror Game Jam, so try it and find what is proppositally bad and what is just bad development.

You are a shrewd detective, looking to solve the mysteries behind mysterious disappearances in a small village. But at no time has life prepared you for the horrors you were about to face. Welcome to true Lovecraftian horror.
